text: Tea is a city in the southeastern part of the U.S. state of South Dakota. It is in Lincoln County, about two miles southwest of Sioux Falls. It became a city in 1894, and 5,598 people lived there at the 2020 census. ==References== ==Other websites== *City of Tea website Category:Cities in South Dakota Category:1894 establishments in the United States Category:1890s establishments in South Dakota
title: Tea, South Dakota
